metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14846 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Ansible, all Ansible Engine versions up to ansible-engine 2.8.5, ansible-engine 2.7.13, ansible-engine 2.6.19, were logging at the DEBUG level which lead to a disclosure of credentials if a plugin used a library that logged credentials at the DEBUG level. This flaw does not affect Ansible modules, as those are executed in a separate process.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.8.6+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.6+dfsg-1').
